subject: Faulty Brake pedal sensor Order #SSN2051 confirmed
description_text:
Greeting,

 

I have received the Plus X Racing Simulator Pedal and Vam Pro ordered below.

 

The pedals work great unit I attached the VAM Pro motors. When either the
throttle or brake VAM motor vibrates, the brake was applied in the game. 

 

I removed the VAM motors, the brake pedal worked fine.  I then remove the
brake pedal from the baseplate and turn it upside down. I put the VAM on top
of the white senor block, see photo between.

 



 

When the VAM motor is activated, the senor sends out a braking signal to the
Simsonn Manager or Simhub app, see below.

 



 

 



 

Could I just exchange the brake pedal, or can you send out a brake senor for
me to fix the problem, please?

 

Regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Dr Chi-Wing Liu,  Please provide complete photos of the correct installation of the pedals and motor, including both side and front views. Placing the VAM Pro on the white sensor at the bottom of the pedal, as you did, will definitely cause vibration, which will lead to changes in the pressure sensor readings. Make sure that the brake pedal mounting bracket does not touch the brake pressure sensor; otherwise, vibrations will be transmitted to the sensor, interfering with the normal pedal input signal.
